creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 2 poems by Fukuyu_ten Masayoshi and Fukuho_en Naoto
markings:
Poets circle mark appers in upper center; the circle name is unidentified.
\"San tai san ban tsuzuki\" is written under the circle mark, which suggests that this piece is a part of three pieces series.
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: (Courtesan with a Pekinese Dog)
